Parameter.Description: Choose the data table on which you want to apply this action
Please mention the quantile value which will be used in calculating robust standard deviation, i.e. if l is the lower quantile and u is the upper quantile then robust standard deviation will be u-l
Please mention the quantile value which will be used in calculating robust standard deviation, i.e. if l is the lower quantile and u is the upper quantile then robust standard deviation will be u-l
List of column names for which you want to apply this outlier handling action
Please mention the number of standard deviations of which a value must vary from the quantiles,i.e if you want a 3 standard deviation limit give input as 3
Please chose the method for handling outliers, clip means replace outliers with threshold values, remove means drop the outliers from the data,invalidate means replace the outliers with null
